summary: Makes atronachs (Flame, Frost and Storm) smaller (and optionally quieter).
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]THIS MOD IS NOT TO BE UPLOADED TO STEAM WORKSHOP.[/b][/u]
You can host the file on any other service should you desire so, but I explicitly forbid anyone from hosting this on steam workshop. If you see this file on steam workshop, please report uploader for breaking mod\'s permissions.

[b]Description:[/b]
This small mod makes summoned atronachs smaller (Frost & Flame by 30%, Storm by 40%). Also the size of the \"Summoning Portal\" effect when casting them was reduced by 30%. This is my first ever publicly released mod, I tried my best to make it without bugs, however should you discover any; please don\'t be too rash with me - my \"knowledge\" of geck/creation kit is akin to modifying swiss watch with a hammer.

[u]Quieter Atronachs movement sounds and Less Small version available under Optional Files.[/u]
[u]Tutorial to make your own customized esp with any size you wish in comments section.[/u]

[b]Why?[/b]
I currently play a conjuration character and after I got perk to have 2 summons available, the interiors felt a bit crowded with 2 atronachs (especially Frost/Storm).


[b]Installation:[/b]
- unzip the contents of the Zip file to your Skyrim directory.
- activate SmallerAtronachs.esp in your mod organizer of choice
- regarding load order: anywhere should be fine, I tried both top and bottom of load order and mod worked as inteded in both cases
- play

or

-click the \"Install with Mod Manager\" button
-activate mod from within NMM
-play
note: I haven\'t actually tested if installing via NMM works, please let me know if it doesn\'t.


[b]Uninstallation:[/b]
- delete Data/meshes/magic/summontargetfxsmall70.nif
- delete Data/SmallerAtronachs.esp


[b]Known Bugs/Conflicts[/b]
No known bugs so far.

Will conflict with any mod altering the forms which this mod changes (see below). That said, I use over 40 mods, most of the popular ones from nexus and haven\'t run into any issues yet. Should you encounter any buggy behaviour let me know please.

The smaller atronachs may have trouble climbing big stairs, nothing I can do about it I\'m afraid, it\'s how Gamebryo (or Creation Engine if you wish to call old dog new name) works. Shouldn\'t pose much of a problem though as the atronachs default behaviour makes them teleport over to you if they\'re stuck someplace usually.

Should any other severe bugs arise I will do my best to try and dispose of them.


[b]This mod affects following forms:[/b]
ARTO
  010012C8 SummonTargetFXsmall70

MGEF
  0004E945 PerkSummonFlameAtronachPotent
  0010EE4A PerkSummonFrostAtronachNPCPotent
  0010EE40 PerkSummonFrostAtronachPCPotent
  0004E946 PerkSummonFrostAtronachPotent
  0010EE4B PerkSummonStormAtronachNPCPotent
  0010EE44 PerkSummonStormAtronachPCPotent
  0004E947 PerkSummonStormAtronachPotent
  0001CEAA SummonFlameAtronach
  0007E5D2 SummonFlameThrall
  000CDECF SummonFlameThrallPotent
  0001CEAB SummonFrostAtronach
  0010EE48 SummonFrostAtronachNPC
  0007E5D3 SummonFrostThrall
  000CDED0 SummonFrostThrallPotent
  0001CEAC SummonStormAtronach
  0010EE49 SummonStormAtronachNPC
  0007E5D4 SummonStormThrall
  000CDED1 SummonStormThrallPotent

RACE
  000131F5 AtronachFlameRace
  000131F6 AtronachFrostRace
  000131F7 AtronachStormRace


[b]Version History[/b]
1.0 - First public release


[b]Thanks to:[/b]
Bethesda - for their first open world game that doesn\'t crash so much I want to kill myself
